SiteRedirectMapping.name: SiteRedirectMapping
SiteRedirectMapping.description: Represents a site redirect from an external site to an Experience Cloud site.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the redirect is enabled.

IsDynamic.description: Indicates whether a redirect rule is dynamic.

SiteId.description: The ID of the site for the redirect.

Source.description: The URL of the site you want to redirect.

Target.description: The URL of the Experience Cloud site you want to users to visit.
